Steps.Message: Update at 19:43 - Our team of specialist engineers arrived on site. At the moment we don't need to change the estimated timeframe, and we'll continue to keep you updated with all of our progress as it comes in from site.

We became aware of a power cut at 17:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 19:43 - Our team of specialist engineers arrived on site. At the moment we don't need to change the estimated timeframe, and we'll continue to keep you updated with all of our progress as it comes in from site.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
